document_data.name: Bifely Lyeelm
document_data.mainbody: '''Bifely Lyeelm''' was the high priestess of [[Cyric]] at the temple dedicated to his worship in [[Mulmaster]]. She was half-crazed from her incessant scheming, though it had worked out somewhat as she managed to ingratiate herself to High Blade [[Rassendyll Uoumdolphin]].
document_data.History: Previously a worshiper of the deity [[Bane]], Bifely converted to the church of Cyric during the [[Time of Troubles]]. When Bane was resurrected, however, she did not forsake her new god. This led to much derision from the Black Lord's clergy in Mulmaster.
